channel.title: Servers in general
channel.description:
Right..
I've portforwarded and such, done the no-ip thing and what not. I've used runelocus to check to see if it was online, it was.
How come I can't login with my no-ip on my client but with localhost it works? - Players can login with the no-ip but my localhost can't. - Main reason for this is I have a brother that wishies to play.
Wondering if anyone could give me any pointers whether its my client or something.

item.title: Servers in general
item.description:
@411 wrote:

Np man glad its working for you now.

Read full topic

item.title: Servers in general
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

[quote=“4, post:3, topic:368760”]This happend to my friend too, other players could log in with the no-ip… but he couldnt. This is what i told him to do… and it worked.

Change the IP in YOUR client to your computers IP, witch is the ip you portforwarded with… if you dont know what im talking about… then search for the cmd… and open it up, type ipconfig. Then it will say your computers IP in there. You should know what im talking about though, if youve already portforwarded.[/quote]

Works!, thank you so much!

Read full topic

item.title: Servers in general
item.description:
@411 wrote:

This happend to my friend too, other players could log in with the no-ip… but he couldnt. This is what i told him to do… and it worked.

Change the IP in YOUR client to your computers IP, witch is the ip you portforwarded with… if you dont know what im talking about… then search for the cmd… and open it up, type ipconfig. Then it will say your computers IP in there. You should know what im talking about though, if youve already portforwarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Servers in general
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

[quote="[J"]ava link=topic=464899.msg3399415#msg3399415 date=1289771896]
Right…

I’ve portforwarded and such, done the no-ip thing and what not.
I’ve used google to check to see if it was online, it was.

How come I can’t login with my no-ip on my client but with localhost it works?

  • Players can login with the no-ip but my localhost can’t.
  • Main reason for this is I have a brother that wishies to play.

Wondering if anyone could give me any pointers whether its my client or something.[/quote]

download the no-ip DUC and update your no-ip here.

Then change your client ip to ur no-ip if u didn’t.

Read full topic
